articles.description: The Small Business Administration mistakenly paid close to $692 million in duplicate Paycheck Protection Program loans to thousands of small businesses.

articles.author: Ashley Carman
articles.title: Facebook will court independent writers to its Substack competitor with paid deals - The Verge
articles.description: Facebook is looking to start testing its newsletter product, and it’ll pay writers to bring them on board for it. The company’s product, which is still unnamed, will integrate with Pages.
articles.content:
Starting testing soon
Illustration by James Bareham / The Verge
